author: Craig Northacker
content: I sailed on her in the 90’s when the non-profit was trying to raise money to re-outfit her. One of the passengers was a former skipper who told me that the Bounty had tremendous leaks even in calm weather. He did not think it was a good candidate for refitting. Later she was sold to I believe a plumbing contractor on Long Island who promised to refit her and sail her. I remember he wound up spending a lot more than he had planned for but lost touch after that. RIP to the two who passed away.
